channel.title: Need help running a server runserver.bat
channel.description:
hello for all u clever people who r experts can u please help me and tell me how to put my runserver on because when ever i put it on
and sometime it says this cannot the create the (the place of the source) runserver.bat file make sure the path and the file name is correct
that is it im new so can u help me please and i have got jdk 6 update 7 and in path i changed the 06 to 07 and can u please post what i shall replace when i do runserver.nat (right click) and edit what shall i replace with ty
